allData.occupation: Founder CEO & CIO @Riess Consulting | ESG & Digital Board Advisor | WomenTech Global Award 3x | TechWomen100 | Strategy Executive & Keynote Speaker

positions.title: Managing Director & Founder, Digital Strategy Consulting
positions.description:
As Senior Strategy Leader and Board Advisor in Technology, Keynote Speaker, Author and Top Women Leader in Tech, I accompany you as an Entrepreneur and Managing Director on your way through the digital transformation.

- Board Advisor
As sparring partner for you as C-level Management, align your business activities for future in sustainable and value-enhancing way through digital transformation

- Keynote Speaker
Style is characterized by explaining technical knowledge in understandable and entertaining way

- Digital Innovator, ESG and Diversity & Inclusion Expert
Transformative and inclusive style is focused on effective, entrepreneurial and prudent governance with value creation for all stakeholders

- Author
Bring you future as it happens. From latest in tech and digital transformation to big stories in strategy and leadership, I’ve got you covered

- Senior Strategy Advisor and CTO
As Strategist, achieve long-term financial impact for you as Business Owner through successful realignment and digitization of business models

- Interim CTO and CDO
You as Managing Director benefit from my leadership style, which is characterized by applying technical expertise in cybersecurity and ESG

- Executive Coach and Mentor
Am Coach who helps you as Leader to manage change and complexity, to break new ground and to achieve goals of your organizations

positions.title: Founder CEO & CIO, Female Tech Recruitment
positions.description:
Riess Tech Female Talent Recruitment Platform is the leading German management and recruitment consultancy for women developers. Our CEO & Founder, Victoria Riess, is one of the most relevant voices around women developers and technology. For her contributions on the topics of Women in Tech, Diversity & Inclusion and New Work, she has already been awarded five times as Top Women Leader in Tech and is also on the road as keynote speaker throughout Europe (25+ speaking engagements with 52,000+ attendees).
The success of her company is also based on this tech expertise. Founded in 2023, she built Riess Tech without outside capital; the company has been operating profitably since day one. She builds and leads C-level management and recruitment consultancy programs for women developers with global teams and renowned clients (such as Adidas, Celonis and BT Group) and helps CEOs on their way to reimagine recruiting.

allData.headline: Founder CEO & CIO @Riess Consulting | ESG & Digital Board Advisor | WomenTech Global Award 3x | TechWomen100 | Strategy Executive & Keynote Speaker
allData.summary:
Senior Strategy Leader, Executive, Managing Director, Founder, Board Advisor in Technology, Cambridge MBA & award-winning Top Women Leader in Tech (WomenTech Global Awards 3x & TechWomen100 Award Winner). Have track record as women leader in tech & 15+ years of leadership experience (two-digit mn P&L) in general management, digital strategy consulting & corporate strategy on digital transformation. Building & leading  65+ C-level digital strategy consulting programs with global teams (two-digit size). Have experience in business strategy, digital transformation, Cloud DevOps Engineering & data science

Track record as Top Women Leader in Tech:
- Sound Senior Strategy Leader in technology (two-digit mn P&L responsibility), building & leading digital functions with high performing global teams
- Demonstrate senior leadership in technology (65+ C-level strategy consulting programs), combining business acumen with innovative strategies to attract & develop top talent
- Known thought leader in technology (digital transformation, cybersecurity & quantum computing), showcasing value of digital capabilities to wider audience
- Collaborate with different senior stakeholders to enable digital experience across my organizations, digital ecosystems & products
- Encourage digital innovation to further positive impact solutions, sustainable practices (ESG) & more inclusive working environment (7-time Top Women Leader in Tech Awards Winner)
- Act as keynote speaker about AI, digital transformation & security as well as strategy, leadership, D&I & ESG

Keynote Speaker: '24 IDM Digital Connect, DIHK Netzwerktag, Wirtschaftsregion Bamberg-Forchheim Event ‘23 Handelsblatt Wintercamp, Zuger Innovationstag, Deutsche Bahn Conference, RSBG Conference, Science meets practice University Passau ‘22 Females in IT Congress ‘21 IBM CASCONxEVOKE, Women in Tech Online Festival, herCAREER 2x ‘20 Chaos Communication Congress 2x

Top Women Leader in Tech Award Winner: '24 WomenTech Network Community Award Global & Germany Winner, empowHERaccess Award, Impact of Diversity Award 3x ‘23 Women in Tech Awards Global TOP 50, Globant Women that Build Award, Study UK Alumni Award Global, FTAfelicitas Award 2x ‘22 German Diversity Award, Rising Star Awards ‘21 WomenTech Global Awards Winner, TechWomen100 Award Winner, LIT eco Award, Digital Female Leader Award ‘20 McKinsey Next Generation Women Leader

Certificates: German Digital Advisory Board, AWS DevOps Engineer, Google Women Developer Academy, Road to Google Developer Expert & Women Techmakers Ambassador
